name: Ailumia Global Ltd
description: Operator and developer of an IT consulting platform. The company's platform is empowered by artificial intelligence technology to guide every aspect of their retail process, providing customers and sellers with solutions and resources for potential challenges in the e-commerce industry.
one_liner: Operator and developer of an IT consulting platform. The company's platform is empowered by artificial intelligence technology to guide every aspect of their retail process, providing customers and sellers with solutions and resources for potential challenges in the e-commerce industry.

name: AmazingTalker Limited
description: Developer of a robust online learning platform designed to empower learners in their pursuit of any language or subject. The company's services include learning with one-on-one attention and guidance, taking customized courses that fit individual schedule, budget and interests and an immersive language learning environment, enabling learners to take online tutoring from professional online language tutors and teachers.
one_liner: Developer of a robust online learning platform designed to empower learners in their pursuit of any language or subject. The company's services include learning with one-on-one attention and guidance, taking customized courses that fit individual schedule, budget and interests and an immersive language learning environment, enabling learners to take online tutoring from professional online language tutors and teachers.

name: AVIONETA Global LLC
description: Provider of healthcare services intended to help patients get rid of their alcohol addiction. The company offers a monthly subscription program that accompanies the consumer or their loved one through different services, as they progress with the program, they are able to have a healthier relationship with alcohol under measurable success criteria, providing patients with information based on science and medicine in a fresh, dignified and respectful way to control their alcohol addiction.
one_liner: Provider of healthcare services intended to help patients get rid of their alcohol addiction. The company offers a monthly subscription program that accompanies the consumer or their loved one through different services, as they progress with the program, they are able to have a healthier relationship with alcohol under measurable success criteria, providing patients with information based on science and medicine in a fresh, dignified and respectful way to control their alcohol addiction.
industry: App, Health Tech, Impact, Subscription, Wellness, Healthcare, Social Impact

name: Brandripe Sdn. Bhd.
description: Operator of a creative service agency intended to provide graphic design services. The company's agency provides advertising materials, web design, social media graphics and illustrations with unlimited design requests and revisions and vetted professional designers, enabling businesses to receive designs at a flat monthly fee.
one_liner: Operator of a creative service agency intended to provide graphic design services. The company's agency provides advertising materials, web design, social media graphics and illustrations with unlimited design requests and revisions and vetted professional designers, enabling businesses to receive designs at a flat monthly fee.

name: Chipax Inc.
description: Developer of a web application designed to organize finances in an efficient way. The company automates processes and carries out the operation in an orderly and transparent way, connecting sales and purchase invoices, expenses, fees, remuneration, and taxes to a checking account to keep total control, enabling businesses to manage their cash flow and other financial statements.
one_liner: Developer of a web application designed to organize finances in an efficient way. The company automates processes and carries out the operation in an orderly and transparent way, connecting sales and purchase invoices, expenses, fees, remuneration, and taxes to a checking account to keep total control, enabling businesses to manage their cash flow and other financial statements.

name: Edukita Pte Ltd
description: Operator of an educational platform intended to deliver an effective and affordable English teaching experience. The company's platform aims to deliver a program that is effective in building fluency in an affordable way and offers live classes delivered by native speakers in an internationally benchmarked curriculum, enabling students to learn English in a way that is both effective and enjoyable.
one_liner: Operator of an educational platform intended to deliver an effective and affordable English teaching experience. The company's platform aims to deliver a program that is effective in building fluency in an affordable way and offers live classes delivered by native speakers in an internationally benchmarked curriculum, enabling students to learn English in a way that is both effective and enjoyable.

name: Karaz Inc Holding Limited
description: Developer of a diabetic health monitoring platform intended to simplify, gamify, and personalize health within the supportive community. The company's platform provides diabetic supplies, telemedicine, personalized diabetic coaching, and support needed to take an active approach toward good health, enabling users to easily manage their diabetes by adjusting and monitoring their blood sugar, nutrition, medication, and physical activity and helping them live a better life.
one_liner: Developer of a diabetic health monitoring platform intended to simplify, gamify, and personalize health within the supportive community. The company's platform provides diabetic supplies, telemedicine, personalized diabetic coaching, and support needed to take an active approach toward good health, enabling users to easily manage their diabetes by adjusting and monitoring their blood sugar, nutrition, medication, and physical activity and helping them live a better life.

name: Playbite Inc.
description: Developer of a gaming platform designed to earn tickets while playing. The company's application allows gamers to redeem their earned ticket for prize money, enabling users to play fun games and earn real prizes.
one_liner: Developer of a gaming platform designed to earn tickets while playing. The company's application allows gamers to redeem their earned ticket for prize money, enabling users to play fun games and earn real prizes.

name: Taxo app LLC
description: Developer of taxation software designed to create a tailored system for accountants. The company's software specializes in offering taxation, tracking, automation, and communication tools, and a client terminal as well as shares tax reports and invoices, and triggers email alerts, enabling accountants to communicate with their colleagues and clients and manage their work.
one_liner: Developer of taxation software designed to create a tailored system for accountants. The company's software specializes in offering taxation, tracking, automation, and communication tools, and a client terminal as well as shares tax reports and invoices, and triggers email alerts, enabling accountants to communicate with their colleagues and clients and manage their work.

name: Text And Pay Me Inc
description: Developer of a payment application designed to turn any text or voice command to make payments. The company's application offers a convenient way to make payments across any digital platform through a payment interface, enabling users to get hassle-free transaction services.
one_liner: Developer of a payment application designed to turn any text or voice command to make payments. The company's application offers a convenient way to make payments across any digital platform through a payment interface, enabling users to get hassle-free transaction services.

name: Wellxai Technologies Ltd
description: Opeartor of an insurance technology intended to support wellness activities. The company aims to disrupt the insurance landscape in the region by offering individuals, families, corporates, and SMEs health insurance that incentivizes engagement in various wellness activities such as gym visits, healthy eating, focusing on mental wellness, utilizing wearable tech, and also provides a third-party embedded device along with an application that monitors health, enabling users to make efficient insurance decisions.
one_liner: Opeartor of an insurance technology intended to support wellness activities. The company aims to disrupt the insurance landscape in the region by offering individuals, families, corporates, and SMEs health insurance that incentivizes engagement in various wellness activities such as gym visits, healthy eating, focusing on mental wellness, utilizing wearable tech, and also provides a third-party embedded device along with an application that monitors health, enabling users to make efficient insurance decisions.

name: Incompleteness Theorem Sdn Bhd
description: Provider of space-as-a-service designed for companies of all sizes from fast-growing startups to multinational corporations. The company uses its on-demand office network to offer community-based workspaces, including community events, high-speed internet, virtual office setups, and private telephone booths, enabling members to discover opportunities while sharing experiences and benefit from the one-stop business center services.
one_liner: Provider of space-as-a-service designed for companies of all sizes from fast-growing startups to multinational corporations. The company uses its on-demand office network to offer community-based workspaces, including community events, high-speed internet, virtual office setups, and private telephone booths, enabling members to discover opportunities while sharing experiences and benefit from the one-stop business center services.

name: Caffeinated Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of an online coffee delivery platform designed to offer coffee of different blends to their customers. The company's platform offers a subscription based interface, as well as delivers the pack of coffee at a person's doorstep, enabling customers to taste dozens of coffees from different parts of the country.
one_liner: Developer of an online coffee delivery platform designed to offer coffee of different blends to their customers. The company's platform offers a subscription based interface, as well as delivers the pack of coffee at a person's doorstep, enabling customers to taste dozens of coffees from different parts of the country.
